Action.author: mastersingh24
Action.body: Most of the code to do the actual processing of updates exists in the peer code. While the optimal solution would be to refactor that code, the singleton nature of the peer makes this a bit difficult and a bit more risky so initially I plan to copy/reuse code and included it in the orderer/common/server package. It will be written in such a way that it can later be moved to a common package if desired.
